Package com.eduworks.ec.framework.view

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EcModal
    View Subclass representing modal views that are displayed in the modal container
    EcOverlay
    Subclass of view for an overlay, extends EcScreen because overlays should have a display name that can be used in the URL bar and in the history so the page can be loaded on back button or startup
    EcScreen
    Subclass of view that is specific for a screen, providing a display name that will be shown in the URL bar and that can be used on startup to check if the URL is asking for a certain page on startup.
    EcView
    Class that represents a "view" that can be displayed in an container element on the page.
